fields.headline: Crossing the Black Sea
fields.bodyText: · From Sochi, there are daily services to Trabzon in Turkey and occasional services to Istanbul. The phone number of the ferry terminal in Sochi is 007 862 260 9603. There is also a twice-monthly ferry service to Istanbul (36 hours) from Novorossiysk, further up the coast. It is run by Novoship (007 861 725 1562). Sophie Ganevitch · From June 30-September 3, Turkish Maritime Lines (tdi.com.tr/eng/denizyollari.shtml, UK agent Alternative Travel, 020-7923 3230, alternativeturkey.com) runs a weekly car and passenger ferry from Trabzon (departing Wednesday 9pm) to Istanbul (arriving Friday 1pm).
